name: Foodies-Express
tech: React.js, HTML, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Firebase, Tailwind-CSS.
Overview: A Review Website including firebase authentication, CRUD operation, JWT verify and add service dynamically Login, Signup system implemented here.Users have to option to give their reviews. Users' reviews will be added here.

name: Coding School

name: Quick Quiz
Overview: Here Users can See Quiz Paper, Choose Their answer, and see if their answer is right or wrong. There is an option to see correct answer. A website with responsive design with a static bar
